name: Mysterious Morpher
description:
Info

You are a creature created using a mysterious material, you're made in a facility where you will be tested on your abilities and intelligence

You have the ability to enter other bodies by consuming them (walking into them)

Once you enter a body you can get out of it again, but the body will be destroyed

Every body has different properties you can use to complete the tests

Controls

Every game has controls, this one surprisingly has some too

The first item under the action is the one you get teached in-game, but the others can also be used

Move right

  • Right arrow key
  • D key

Move left

  • Left arrow key
  • A key
  • Q key (Useful for AZERTY keyboard)

Jump

  • Up arrow key (When gravity is normal)
  • Down arrow key (When gravity is reversed)
  • Space (Works for both gravity directions)

Leave body

You can use this to leave the body you are currently controlling, this will destroy the body and boost you up

  • Enter key

Skip cutscene

Cutscenes can get really long

  • Backspace key
  • Click on the "Skip" button in the right corner
Credits

Sound effects are made using SFXR

I'm not a musician, so I used some free music from PlayOnLoop.com, wich means I also have to give some credit

Music: “The Three Forces”, from PlayOnLoop.com
Licensed under Creative Commons by Attribution 4.0

Licensed under Creative Commons by Attribution 4.0

Music: “Power Battle”, from PlayOnLoop.com
Licensed under Creative Commons by Attribution 4.0

Music: “Combat Plan”, from PlayOnLoop.com
Licensed under Creative Commons by Attribution 4.0

Music: “Final Act”, from PlayOnLoop.com
Licensed under Creative Commons by Attribution 4.0

Music: “Club March”, from PlayOnLoop.com
Licensed under Creative Commons by Attribution 4.0

Music: “Secret Labs”, from PlayOnLoop.com
Licensed under Creative Commons by Attribution 4.0

This game was made for the Dani's Basement Game Jam with the theme: "You are what you consume!"

Notes

This game might be quite hard

I did a speedrun of the game (for the quickest ending) and my time is around 3 minutes

The buttons on the title screen are clickable, it may not seem like it because there's no indication when you hover over them, just left click with your mouse and the buttons will work

The door at the end of a test is locked until the cutscene ends, keep this in mind!
